register_info Struct Reference


Data Fields

int reg
unsigned int reg_value
unsigned int reg_mask

Detailed Description

This structure is used with IOCTL. It defines register, register value, register mask and event number

Field Documentation

int reg

register number

unsigned int reg_mask

mask of bits, only used with PMIC_WRITE_REG

unsigned int reg_value

value of register
